SOFA score

Respiration

Collection of function to clean and impute respiratory parameters

clean_fio2()
Clean FiO2
clean_spo2()
Clean SpO2
impute_fio2()
Impute FiO2
impute_pao2()
Impute PaO2 with SpO2
pfratio_imputed()
Calculate P/F-ratio
o2supply_to_fio2()
O2-supply to FiO2
spo2_to_pao2()
Convert SpO2 to PaO2

Helper functions

cbrt()
Calculate cube root of x
